key.name: show-overview-when-change-workspace
key.description: Show the Overview when changing Workspace allowing to see and select window.

key.name: show-window-selector-when-show-overview
key.summary: Show Window Selector when Show Overview
key.description: Show Window Selector when Show Overview without using keybinding.

key.name: logging
key.description: Enable logging to help debugging. Note that all errors will be logged even if this option is set to false.
